title: Model Set
description: A file set grouping files that represent trained predictive models. Model file sets contain data files that could be used by predictive modeling software to generate predictions or annotations of genomic features such as genomic variants.

not.comment: Model file sets should not specify any donors or samples.

model_name.title: Model Name
model_name.description: The custom lab name given to this predictive model set.

model_version.title: Model Version
model_version.description: The semantic version number for this predictive model set.

file_set_type.description: The category that best describes this predictive model set.
file_set_type.comment: File set type describes the framework of the model in this model set.

enum_descriptions.decision tree: A model that makes decisions based on a series of questions about feature values, resulting in a tree-like structure.
enum_descriptions.neural network: A model consisting of interconnected layers of nodes used for complex pattern recognition.
enum_descriptions.random forest: An ensemble of decision trees that improves accuracy by averaging predictions from multiple trees.
enum_descriptions.support vector machine: A model that finds the best boundary to separate different classes in high-dimensional space.
enum_descriptions.variant binding effect: A model predicting variant effect on TF binding.

prediction_objects.title: Prediction Objects
prediction_objects.description: The objects this predictive model set is targeting.

items.title: Prediction Object
items.description: An object this predictive model set is targeting.

input_file_sets.description: The file set(s) that served as inputs for the derivation of this model set.

model_zoo_location.title: Model Zoo Location
model_zoo_location.description: The link to the model on the Kipoi repository.

software_version.title: Software Version
software_version.description: Version of software used for the derivation of this model set.

samples.comment: Do not submit. Model sets should not specify any samples.

donors.comment: Do not submit. Model sets should not specify any donors.

assessed_genes.title: Assessed Genes
assessed_genes.description: A list of genes assessed in this model set.

items.title: Gene
items.comment: See gene.json for a list of available identifiers.

external_input_data.title: External Input Data
external_input_data.description: A tabular file with links to external data utilized for this model.
